RSD Exclusive Release

RSD Limited Run / Regional Focus Release

'RSD First' Release

View More

13th Floor Elevators

We Are Not Live

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Charly Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

2026 Record Store Day reprise of the 1968 album 'Live' by the 13th Floor Elevators. Spurned at the time for being billed as "Live" when in fact it was a compilation of previously recorded studio masters, outtakes and alternate mixes. The "very loud" crowd noise was overdubbed and was actually taken from a boxing match and wholly inappropriate for the purpose. Now, almost 60 years on, the album masters are available, in their original sequence, without the crowd noise, to be enjoyed in their full psychedelic splendor.

Tracklist
SIDE A
1. Before You Accuse Me
2. She Lives In A Time Of Her Own
3. Tried To Hide
4. You Gotta Take That Girl
5. I'm Gonna Love You Too
SIDE B
1. Everybody Needs Somebody To Love
2. I've Got Levitation
3. You Can't Hurt Me Anymore
4. Roller Coaster
5. You're Gonna Miss Me

13th Floor Elevators
We Are Not Live
Format: LP
View More

A-Ha

Analogue 20th Anniversary Deluxe Edition

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Analogue is a-ha's eighth studio album, originally released in late 2005. To celebrate its 20th anniversary, a deluxe 2-CD edition will be released featuring 21 bonus tracks15 of which are previously unreleasedincluding b-sides, remixes, demos, and alternate versions. Includes the hit singles, Celice, Analogue (All I Want) and Cosy Prisons. It charted internationally, hitting #1 in Norway and top 30 in several other countries. The album was produced by a-ha and Martin Terefe, mixed by Flood, and features backing vocals from Graham Nash. The audio has been remastered by Bill Inglot, and this release marks the album's first appearance on vinyl.

Tracklist
LP1:
A1. CELICE (2026 REMASTER)
A2. DONT DO ME ANY FAVOURS (2026 REMASTER)
A3. COSY PRISONS (2026 REMASTER)
A4. ANALOGUE (ALL I WANT) [2026 REMASTER]
B1. BIRTHRIGHT (2026 REMASTER)
B2. HOLY GROUND (2026 REMASTER)
B3. OVER THE TREETOPS (2026 REMASTER)
LP2
C1. HALFWAY THROUGH THE TOUR (2026 REMASTER)
C2. THE FINE BLUE LINE (2026 REMASTER)
C3. KEEPER OF THE FLAME (2026 REMASTER)
D1. MAKE IT SOON (2026 REMASTER)
D2. WHITE DWARF (2026 REMASTER)
D3. THE SUMMERS OF OUR YOUTH (2026 REMASTER)

A-Ha
Analogue 20th Anniversary Deluxe Edition
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Air

AIR Moon Safari - The Athens Concert

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Recorded during a warm night in Athens under the Acropolis, this album captures Air at their most magnetic and ethereal. Blending analog warmth with their unmistakable electronic grace, the duo plays its classic album unveils new arrangements that resonate through the oldest theater in the world's mesmerizing acoustics.
Each track becomes a dialogue between the French duos timeless sound and the Athenian stones intimate, shimmering, and full of emotion. The Athens Concert is not just a concert recording; its a sonic memory of a unique night that united music, light, and history in perfect harmony. And the first live album ever released by the legendary French band to celebrate their 2024 - 2025 tour.

Air
AIR Moon Safari - The Athens Concert
Format: LP
View More

Alcatrazz

No Parole From Rock 'N' Roll

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Culture Factory
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

1983s No Parole From Rock 'n' Roll is the first studio album by heavy metal band Alcatrazz, led by veteran singer Graham Bonnet and guitar aficionado Yngwie Malmsteen. It spent seven weeks on the Billboard 200 albums chart. The album precipitated guitarist Yngwie Malmsteen's solo career, and is most famous for the single "Island In The Sun."
This is a special deluxe 2 LP set one disc is the original release while the second is an instrumental version. This special Deluxe 2 LP package includes: OBI side spine, original art work, printed inner sleeves and one red/black splatter and one black/red splatter effect vinyl.

Tracklist
Island In The Sun |General Hospital | Jet to Jet |Hiroshima Mon Amour | Kree Nakoorie | Incubus | Too Young To Die, Too Drunck To Live | Big Foot | Starcarr Lane | Suffer Me | Island In The Sun (Instrumental) |General Hospital (Instrumental) | Jet to Jet (Instrumental) |Hiroshima Mon Amour (Instrumental) | Kree Nakoorie (Instrumental) | Incubus (Instrumental) | Too Young To Die, Too Drunck To Live (Instrumental) | Big Foot (Instrumental) | Starcarr Lane (Instrumental) | Suffer Me (Instrumental)

Alcatrazz
No Parole From Rock 'N' Roll
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Art Of Noise

The Seduction of Claude Debussy

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Demon Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Finally! The fifth and final studio album by the Art of Noise and their only studio album never released on vinyl sees that fact corrected with an exclusive pressing for record store day 2026 on translucent blue 2LP. The album line-up consisted of Trevor Horn, Anne Dudley, Paul Porley and Lol Creme, along with other appearances from John Hurt, soprano Sally Bradshaw, Rakim, and Donna Lewis.
The seduction of claude debussy is the fifth and final studio album by the art of noise, released in 1999 and saw the realisation of a long time recurring idea of trevor horns (as borrowed by the pet shop boys lyric in left to my own devices) with the blending of music of french impressionist composer claude debussy with drum and bass, opera, hip hop, jazz, and narration, to create a concept album described as "the soundtrack to a film that wasn't made about the life of claude debussy
the album is newly mastered by phil kinrade at air studios using the original production master and includes the rakim featuring single metaforce and in addition this exclusive double vinyl lp features four era specific bonus tracks
the bonus tracks originally to be released in july 1998 as a 12" single to promote the album were previously only released on the digital ep born again! and have never been released on a physical format.

Art Of Noise
The Seduction of Claude Debussy
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Roy Ayers

Daddy Bug

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Nature Sounds
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Daddy Bug was the third and final studio work for Atlantic by the great Roy Ayers. The album was released in 1969, a year before Ayers would form his groundbreaking band Ubiquity. Produced by jazz icon Herbie Mann, Daddy Bug is full of cool, stylish vibraphone-heavy instrumental jazz with contributions from some of the best sidemen in the business - including Herbie Hancock on piano, Ron Carter on bass, Hubert Laws on flute, Sonny Sharrock on guitar, and both Bruno Carr and Freddie Waits on drums. Now, after years out of print, this classic album is available again in a Yellow colored vinyl run for Record Store Day 2026.

Tracklist
A1. Daddy Bug
A2. Bonita
A3. This Guy's In Love With You
A4. I Love You Michelle
B1. Shadows
B2. Emmie
B3. Look To The Sky
B4. It Could Only Happen With You

Roy Ayers
Daddy Bug
Format: LP
View More

BABYMETAL

Live At The O2 Arena - Highlights

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 12" Vinyl EP
Label: Capitol Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Live at The O2 captures the electrifying BABYMETAL live experience, brought exclusively to vinyl for Record Store Day. This beautifully presented clear vinyl features fan favorites from across the bands catalogue, including Gimme Chocolate!! and RATATATA from their recent Billboard Top 10 album Metal Forth, all recorded at Londons world-famous O2 Arena.

BABYMETAL DEATH
PA PA YA!! (feat. F.HERO)

from me to u (feat. Poppy)
Road of Resistance

BABYMETAL

Bad Brains

Live

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Org Music
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Originally released on SST Records and recorded during the band's 1987 I Against I tour, Live captures Bad Brains at their most ferocious, channeling the explosive energy and precision that defined their legendary performances. Newly remastered by Dave Gardner and pressed on limited-edition Solar Flare color vinyl, this Record Store Day 2026 exclusive marks the albums first vinyl reissue since SST's original 1988 pressing. The new edition also features the band's fiery take on "Daytripper/She's A Rainbow" as a bonus track. Released via the Bad Brains Records imprint as part of Org Music's ongoing reissue series.

Tracklist
1 I
2 At The Movies
3 The Regulator
4 Right Brigade
5 I Against I
6 I & I Survive
7 House Of Suffering
8 Re-Ignition
9 Sacred Love
10 She's Calling You
11 Coptic Times
12 F.V.K.
13 Secret 77
14 Daytripper

Bad Brains
Live
Format: LP
View More

Tony Bennett

MTV Unplugged

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Legacy Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Tony Bennetts Grammy-winning MTV Unplugged session, released on vinyl for the very first time. Recorded live in New York City in April 1994, this landmark album showcases Bennetts timeless interpretations of the Great American Songbook, backed by the impeccable Ralph Sharon Trio. This 2LP set, pressed exclusively for Record Store Day, features 21 unforgettable tracks, including classics like "I Left My Heart in San Francisco", "Fly Me to the Moon", and "Steppin Out With My Baby".

Tracklist
Side A
1. Old Devil Moon
2. Speak Low
3. It Had To Be You
4. I Love A Piano
5. It Amazes Me
6. The Girl I Love (a/k/a The Man I Love)
Side B
1. Fly Me To The Moon (In Other Words)
2. Youre All The World To Me
3. Rags To Riches
4. When Joanna Loved Me
5. The Good Life/I Wanna Be Around
6. I Left My Heart In San Francisco
Side C
1. Steppin Out With My Baby
2. Moonglow (Performed with k.d. lang)
3. They Cant Take That Away From Me (Performed with Elvis Costello)
4. A Foggy Day 5. All Of You
Side D
1. Body And Soul
2. It Dont Mean A Thing If It Aint Got That Swing
3. Autumn Leaves/Indian Summer
4. (Just A) Little Street Where Old Friends Meet
5. When Do The Bells Ring For Me

Tony Bennett
MTV Unplugged
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Black Sabbath Featuring Tony Iommi

Seventh Star

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Released in 1986, Seventh Star was the twelfth studio album recorded by Black Sabbath for Warner. The first of three collaborations between Tony Iommi and former Deep Purple and Trapeze vocalist Glenn Hughes, the album featured the single No Stranger To Love. Pressed on Red and Black Splatter vinyl, this newly remastered edition now includes the single remix version of No Stranger To Love.

Tracklist
Side One:
1. In For The Kill
2. No Stranger To Love
3. Turn To Stone
4. Sphinx (The Guardian)
5. Seventh Star
Side Two:
1. Danger Zone
2. Heart Like A Wheel
3. Angry Heart
4. In Memory

Black Sabbath Featuring Tony Iommi
Seventh Star
Format: LP
View More

The Blasters

Rare Blasts: Studio Outtakes And Movie Music 1979-1985

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Liberation Hall
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Rare Blasts is a compilation of outtakes and movie music tracks from the roots-rock Americana band's 1980s studio albums. The 14-track collection was compiled as part of the sold out 5-LP box set, An American Music Story, released for RSD 2025. The LP features highly collectible tracks from their studio recordings many never available previously on vinyl. Includes liner notes from L.A. music writer Chris Morris. Pressed on cobalt blue vinyl exclusively for Record Store Day.

Tracklist
1 21 Days In Jail
2 Love 24 Hours A Day
3 I Fell In Love
4 So Glad
5 Ashamed Of Myself
6 Lone Wolf
7 One Bad Stud
8 Blue Shadows
9 Justine
10 Leave My Money Alone
11 Flat Top Joint
12 Cry For Me
13 Can't Stop Time
14 Kathleen

The Blasters
Rare Blasts: Studio Outtakes And Movie Music 1979-1985
Format: LP
View More

Bluey

Up Here Zoetrope Picture Disc

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Demon Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Joff Bush and the Bluey Music Team proudly present for Record Store Day 2026 an exclusive Zoetrope picture disc of the brand-new Bluey album Up Here. Featuring 17 brand-new recordings from a number of fan-favourite episodes including Sleepytime and Flatpack, with exclusive Zoetrope artwork, this is a must have for fans of Bluey.
this was our most ambitious album to date - so we wanted something extra special - something weve wanted to make for a long time. orchestral music can be so emotionally powerful and to be introducing kids and families to this music is an opportunity i treasure. hearing the music from episodes like sleepytime and the sign in all its orchestral splendour meant tissues needed to be on hand throughout the mixing process.
fittingly, the theme of this album is growing up. much of this music, like the episodes they derive from, explore what it means when kids start to discover their independence and venture out on their own. whether thats learning to sleep in their own bed or taking a spaceship to mars. i hope you enjoy up here, as the opportunity i had to make this album is thanks to you! your wonderful support of the music in bluey has allowed us to take it to new heights.

Tracklist
Bluey Theme Tune (Orchestral Version)
Sleepytime
Puppets
Curry Quest
Alongside
Ice Cream (Waltz of the Flowers)
Flatpack
Hotel
Seesaw
Pirates
Stumpfest
Relax
Tradies
Space
Mt Mumandad
Well See
Bluey Theme Tune (The Sign Version)

Bluey
Up Here Zoetrope Picture Disc
Format: LP
View More

MORE INFO

Originally released as a 13 track cutdown of Bowies 20th studio album, The Outside, this exclusive clear vinyl version features the remastered audio for the first time, and cut to half-speed at AIR studios, London.

View More

Danny Brown

Grown Up

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 7" Vinyl
Label: Reservoir Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Danny Browns grown up is a cult-classic hip-hop single that captures everything fans love about the Detroit rapperwit, grit, and unfiltered personality. dropped in 2012, the track is built on party supplies playful, piano-loop beat that feels like a 90s throwback with just the right amount of bounce. over it, Danny rewinds to his childhood, spitting about chipped teeth, scuffed sneakers, and the kind of rough edges that shaped his razor-sharp style. The singles video, starring a pint-sized danny lookalike raising hell across the city, turned the song into an underground sensation and fan favorite. Grown Up remains one of browns signature momentsequal parts nostalgic storytelling and high-energy fun, proof of his ability to blend classic hip-hop sensibilities with his one-of-a-kind voice. This 7 includes the instrumental version as the b-side.

Tracklist
A. Grown Up B. Grown Up (Instrumental)

Danny Brown
Grown Up
Format: 7" Vinyl
View More

Jeff Buckley

Live L'Olympia

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Legacy Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

This live album captures Jeff Buckley and band across two nights in Paris July 6th & 7th during his 1995 European tour in support of the release of his Grace album. Captured at the legendary Olympia, it found Buckley before a rapturous French crowd performing half of the songs from his beloved debut album ( including favorites like Lover, You Should Have Come Over and Hallelujah) plus covers as varied as the MC5s Kick Out The Jams, a Led Zeppelin parody and songs made famous by Nina Simone and Edith Piaf. In addition, the album features an additional live performance of Buckley and Alim Qasimov in a competitive Qawwali singing duet from a festival of sacred music also captured that year in France. Originally released in 2001, this marks the albums first time on vinyl exclusively for Record Store Day.

Tracklist
Side A
1. Lover, You Shouldve Come Over
2. Dream Brother
Side B
1. Eternal Life
2. Kick Out the Jams
3. Lilac Wine
Side C
1. Grace
2. Thats All I Ask
3. Kashmir (Led Zeppelin Parody)
4. Je ne connais pas la fin
Side D
1. Hallelujah
2. What Will You Say (Live at Classic Festival)

Jeff Buckley
Live L'Olympia
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Jeff Buckley

Live L'Olympia

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: CD
Label: Legacy Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

This live album captures Jeff Buckley and band across two nights in Paris July 6th & 7th during his 1995 European tour in support of the release of his Grace album. Captured at the legendary Olympia, it found Buckley before a rapturous French crowd performing half of the songs from his beloved debut album ( including favorites like Lover, You Should Have Come Over and Hallelujah) plus covers as varied as the MC5s Kick Out The Jams, a Led Zeppelin parody and songs made famous by Nina Simone and Edith Piaf. In addition, the album features an additional live performance of Buckley and Alim Qasimov in a competitive Qawwali singing duet from a festival of sacred music also captured that year in France. Originally released in 2001

Leslie Butler

Ja-Gan

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: BMG
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Originally released in 1975, this album is known to be one of the coolest and most highly regarded dub albums on the 70s. The album is currently unavailable in any physical format (aside second hand) or on streaming platforms, therefore sought after! All tracks produced by the mighty Harry J.

Captain Beefheart & The Magic Band

Lick My Decals Off, Baby (Deluxe Edition)

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Deluxe edition of the classic 1970 album from Captain Beefheart and The Magic Band. This limited edition 2LP vinyl set features the original album, recut from the original master tapes at Bernie Grundman Mastering, plus an additional LP with previously unreleased instrumental versions and alternate takes from the original album sessions.

Tracklist
LP1:
1. Lick My Decals Off, Baby
2. Doctor Dark
3. I Love You, You Big Dummy
4. Peon
5. Bellerin' Plain

9. Petrified Forest
10. One Red Rose That I Mean
11. The Buggy Boogie Woogie
12. The Smithsonian Institute Blues (Or The Big Dig)
13. Space-Age Couple
14. The Clouds Are Full Of Wine (Not Whiskey Or Rye)
15. Flash Gordon's Ape
LP2:
1. Lick My Decals Off, Baby (Instrumental Version)
2. Doctor Dark (Instrumental Version)

13. Flash Gordon's Ape (Instrumental Version)
14. Woe-Is-Uh-Me-Bop (Alternate Version)
15. I Wanna Find A Woman That'll Hold My Big Toe Till I Have To Go (Alternate Version)
16. Lick My Decals Off, Baby (Alternate Version)
17. I Love You, You Big Dummy (Instrumental Harp Version)

Brandi Carlile

Live At Easy Street Records Vol II

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Lost Highway
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Nearly two decades after recording her first live album at Seattle's Easy Street Records, Brandi Carlile returned to the iconic record store for Brandi Carlile Live at Easy Street Records Vol. II. Celebrating her 8th studio album, Returning To Myself, the show marked a full-circle moment for the 11x Grammy Award winner. Joined by The Hanseroth Twins and SistaStrings, Carlile played to a full house and was met with an outpouring of love from fans who celebrated her return to the city where it all began.

Tracklist
Returning To Myself
A War With Time
A Woman Oversees
Human
Church & State
The Story
This Time Tomorrow

Brandi Carlile
Live At Easy Street Records Vol II
Format: LP
View More

The Cars

Heartbeat City Live

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Celebrating over 40 years since its original release, Heartbeat City remains The Cars most commercially successful album, certified 4x platinum in the US and charting worldwide. Produced by Robert John Mutt Lange, it features six hit singles including Drive, You Might Think, and Magic. Features all live versions from1984 recorded at The Summit in Houston, Texas (previously unreleased on any audio format - physical or digital).

Mama Cass

Dream A Little Dream (Expanded Edition)

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Geffen Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Originally released in 1968, Dream a Little Dream marked Cass Elliots powerful emergence as a solo artistan elegant, confident statement that positioned her not as a pop star chasing trends, but as a timeless vocal interpreter with unmistakable emotional authority. Eschewing psychedelia for sophistication, the album blends classic pop, soul, and introspective songwriting, foregrounding Elliots warmth, vulnerability, and command.
This Record Store Day edition deepens the albums legacy by including two tracks from the original sessions previously unreleased on vinyl: Darling Be Home Soon (by John Sebastian) and Sisotowbell Lane (by Joni Mitchell), offering fans and collectors a richer, more complete portrait of one of the eras most distinctive and underappreciated voices.

Tracklist
Dream A Little Dream of Me, California Earthquake, The Room Nobody Lives In, Talkin' To Your Toothbush, Blues for Breakfast, Youn Know Who I Am, Rubber Band, Long Time Loving You, Jane, The Insane Dog Lady, What Was I Thinking Of, Burn Your Hatred, Sweet Believer + album outtakes Darling Be Home Soon (written by John Sebastian) and "Sisotowbell Lane" (written by Joni Mitchell)

Mama Cass
Dream A Little Dream (Expanded Edition)
Format: LP

John Coltrane

The Tiberi Tapes: A Preview of the Mythic Recordings

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Verve/Impulse!
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Among the most fabled and mythologized recordings of the last 65 years, the private recordings of John Coltranes group made by musician Frank Tiberi in the early 1960s have long been the subject of jazz world rumor and intense speculation. Tiberi followed Coltrane and his Classic Quartet into clubs in New York and Philadelphia, capturing the otherworldly music being created nightly on his portable tape recorder.
For the first time ever, these recordings will be made available in September 2026 as part of John Coltranes Centennial celebrations. For Record Store Day 2026, were offering a single LP preview of these historic recordingsa project that will undoubtedly grow and enhance the legend of John Coltrane.

Tracklist
SIDE A:
1. Giant Steps (13:51)
SIDE B:
2. Satellite (11:44)

John Coltrane
The Tiberi Tapes: A Preview of the Mythic Recordings
Format: LP
View More

John Coltrane Quartet

France 1965: The Complete Concerts

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 4 x LP
Label: Charly Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

John Coltrane Quartet France 1965: The Complete Concerts (4LP set Gatefold Sleeve Centenary Edition)
marking 100 years since coltranes birth, charly records presents france 1965: the complete concerts - a landmark 4lp set housed in a gatefold package featuring photographs, a concert poster, and new liner notes. this historic collection brings together, for the first time ever, the complete series of performances by the revered john coltrane quartet in france in july 1965, capturing the original classic quartet lineup - john coltrane (tenor saxophone), mccoy tyner (piano), jimmy garrison (bass), and elvin jones (drums) - during their final european tour together.
a historic moment in jazz history
in july 1965, coltrane and his group were booked for three extraordinary performances in france:
- july 26 international jazz festival, juan-les-pins, antibes
- july 27 international jazz festival, juan-les-pins, antibes
- july 28 salle pleyel, paris
on july 26, the quartet performed the only complete live version of a love supreme ever known to have been played by the original lineup. previously believed lost to time, the charly records archivists have painstakingly recovered and restored the full performance, long thought to survive only in a brief french tv excerpt.
a love supreme - reborn
recorded just seven months after coltrane entered rudy van gelders studio to record a love supreme (december 9, 1964), these performances offer a transcendent continuation of that spiritual masterpiece.
coltrane described a love supreme as an offering of faith - a humble attempt to say thank you, god. in france, that devotion reached the stage: extended improvisations, spiritual intensity, and collective telepathy between four musicians at their creative and emotional peak.
the complete french tour - finally united
while fragments of these concerts have appeared over the years on scattered cd and vinyl releases, france 1965: the complete concerts marks the first time every note from this historic tour is presented together and in full fidelity.
across four lps, listeners will experience:
- the complete a love supreme suite, performed live for the first and only time.
- powerful renditions of naima, my favorite things, impressions, ascension, and afro blue.
- coltranes bold reinterpretations of familiar material as he edged toward the free jazz revolution that would define his final years.
an essential bridge between eras
these recordings document coltranes crucial transitional phase - balancing the lyricism and structure of his early work with the boundless exploration that would characterize his late period with pharoah sanders and alice coltrane.
the result is an unprecedented portrait of an artist and ensemble on the threshold of transformation - spiritually charged, deeply focused, and utterly fearless.
a significant archival jazz release - a once-lost moment in history, released in celebration of coltranes centenary.

Tracklist
DAY 1 - Monday 26th July 1965 - International Jazz Festival, Juan- Les-Pins, Antibes, France
SIDE A
1. Acknowledgement [A Love Supreme Part 1]
2. Resolution [A Love Supreme Part 2]
SIDE B
1. Pursuance [A Love Supreme Part 3]
SIDE C
1. Psalm [A Love Supreme Part 4]
DAY 2 - Tuesday 27th July 1965 - International Jazz Festival, Juan- Les-Pins, Antibes, France
SIDE D
1. Announcements
2. Naima
3. Ascension (Quartet Version, AKA Blue Valse)
SIDE E
1. My Favorite Things
SIDE F
1. Impressions
DAY 3 - Wednesday 28th July 1965 - Salle Pleyel, Paris, France
SIDE G
1. Blue Valse
SIDE H
1. Afro Blue
2. Impressions (2nd Version)

John Coltrane Quartet
France 1965: The Complete Concerts
Format: 4 x LP
View More

Alice Cooper

The Revenge Of Alice Cooper - Limited Picture Disc

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: earMUSIC
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Limited Picture Disc pressing of the now-infamous Alice Cooper Group reunion album!
For the first time in over 50 years, Alice Cooper and the original band reunite to bring rock n roll back from the shadows! The Revenge of Alice Cooper is a high-voltage journey into vintage horror and classic 70s shock rock. Together, theyve created an album packed with the sound, energy, and mischief that made them legendary.
This album throws you straight into the golden era of Killer, Billion Dollar Babies, Schools Out, and Love It to Deathpacked with electrifying riffs, raw energy, and Alices signature storytelling. From the venomous bite of Black Mamba to the rebellious charge of Wild Ones, and the soft, haunting melodies of See You on the Other Side, every track feels like a lost rock n roll classic.

Stewart Copeland

The Rhythmatist

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Demon Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Reissued on vinyl for the first time since its original release, to celebrate its recent 40th anniversary in 2025, this groundbreaking project and album is pressed on translucent blue vinyl for the first time exclusively for Record Store Day. 

Every copy of this vinyl repressing also comes with an exclusive art print signed personally by Stewart Copeland exclusively for Record Store Day.

Following the breakup of The Police, their drummer Stewart Copeland undertook a musical odyssey through the heart of Africa in search of the roots of rock & roll. Originally released as both a film, (directed and produced by Jean-Pierre Dutilleux) and album in 1985, The Rhythmatist preceded the release of Graceland by Paul Simon which was to follow in 1986.
The album, produced by Stewart along with Jeff Seitz, featured the singles Koteja (Oh Bolilla) featuring Ray Lema, a major figure in world music himself, as well as Gong Rock.

Never repressed since its original release, the brand new edition comes with exclusive refreshed artwork and is newly mastered from the original master tapes by Phil Kinrade at Air Studios.

Tracklist
SIDE ONE
Koteja (Oh Bolilla)
Brazzaville
Liberte
Coco
Kemba

SIDE TWO
Samburu Sunset
Gong Rock
Franco
Serengeti Long Walk
African Dream

Stewart Copeland
The Rhythmatist
Format: LP
View More

The Cult

Weapon of Choice

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Cooking Vinyl
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Available for the first time on vinyl, Weapon of Choice is an earlier take on The Cults album Choice of Weapon, produced by Chris Goss, before Bob Rock came on board to help finish the album. For Record Store Day 2026, pressed on silver effect vinyl and housed in a mirrorboard sleeve.
Known by fans as the prequel to Choice of Weapon, the collection stands on its own: more immediate, raw, and a rare look into The Cults creative process at a pivotal moment. Tracks like Supreme (an early take on Honey From a Knife), The Bones (a precursor to For the Animals), and Gibraltar (the foundation of The Wolf) showcase the band reconnecting with their signature heavy-atmospheric sound while pushing into new territory.
Strictly limited to 3,000 copies worldwide.
This is a 2026 Record Store Day release.

Tracklist
A1. Aurora A2. A Pale Horse A3. The Bones A4. Decado A5. Elemental Light
B1. Gibraltar B2. Twisted And Bleeding B3. Militant B4. Supreme B5. Lucifer

The Cult
Weapon of Choice
Format: LP
View More

Skeeter Davis

The End of the World: The Navy Hoedown Sessions

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Country Rewind
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Skeeter Davis fans are in for a fascinating detour with The Navy Hoedown Sessions, a 50th-anniversary reissue of the 1975 double album that is as much a historical curiosity as it is a musical treat. Originally produced for the U.S. Navy as a recruitment recording, the album was pressed in very limited quantities and has remained almost unheard. Featuring Daviss signature country-pop sound and some of her greatest hits, these recordings are a true delight. Pressed on pink vinyl for Record Store Day 2026, dont miss this rare opportunity.

Tracklist

Dr. Demento

Get Demented

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 12" Single
Label: Demented Punk
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The physical debut of all-new material from the legendary Dr. Demento paired with newly restored and remastered material from 1980 that's been unavailable and out of print for decades. Pressed on limited edition colored 12-inch vinyl exclusively for Record Store Day.
GET DEMENTED WITH DR. DEMENTO!
Dr. Demento unleashes Get Demented, a wild new single that revives the spirit of classic novelty music with a Dr. Seuss-inspired visual style and a wink of pure comic genius.
The legendary Dr. Demento is back to stir up a new wave of madness with his all-new single Get Demented." The worlds most beloved purveyor of mad music and crazy comedy takes the mic himself, leading this wild new original track backed by nerd-rock outfit the Amoeba People. Written especially for Dr. Demento, the song carries forward the tradition of classic novelty music while bringing in sharp, modern themes that fit perfectly in todays unpredictable times.
Visually, the singles cover art is just as outrageous as the title track itself. The stunning new Dr. Seuss-inspired cover art was illustrated by Joe Simko, the celebrated lead artist behind Topps Garbage Pail Kids and Wacky Packages, with concept and art direction by John Cafiero of Osaka Popstar and Demented Punk. The result blends two unmistakable pop-culture icons, Dr. Seuss and Dr. Demento, into one unforgettable image that captures the gleeful absurdity of the moment.
The new single makes its physical debut with this RSD exclusive release on limited edition 12-inch colored vinylalso featuring Dr. Dementos long out of print cover version of the novelty classic Shaving Cream on the flip side! Originally released in 1980, Dementos rendition of Shaving Cream has been digitally restored and newly remastered in 24 bit from the analog source to be made available once again for the first time in decades!
For more than fifty years, Dr. Demento has been the authority on musical mischief, championing novelty hits and discovering new voices in the art of the absurd. His long-running syndicated radio show, (still available to stream exclusively at DrDemento.com), created an entire genre of comedy music and launched the career of Weird Al Yankovic. His influence has earned him honors in the Comedy Music Hall of Fame, the National Radio Hall of Fame, and even a cameo on The Simpsons.
With Get Demented, Dr. Demento proves hes still leading the charge for weirdness in all its forms. Its a reminder that laughter, satire, and a good hook never go out of style.

Tracklist
1.) Get Demented
2.) Shaving Cream

Dr. Demento
Get Demented
Format: 12" Single
View More

Doctor Who

The Rescue

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Demon Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Brand new for Record Store Day 2026, a narrated tv soundtrack of the 1965 serial starring William Hartnell as The Doctor. Comprising two episodes, the powerful enemy and desperate measures, the story features the debut of companion Vicki, played by Maureen OBrien who now provides newly recorded linking narration and a bonus behind-the-scenes interview.
the doctor, ian (william russell) and barbara (jacqueline hill) discover a crashed spaceship on the planet dido in the 25th century. survivors vicki and bennett are menaced by a terrifying native named koquillion or are they? the travellers risk their lives to discover the truth.
sixty years after its original broadcast, the rescue is presented for the first time on 140g rescue red translucent vinyl in a beautifully illustrated outer sleeve depicting koquillion, plus an illustrated inner sleeve which includes full cast and credits.

Tracklist
Side 1
Episode 1 - The Powerful Enemy
Side 2
Episode 2 - Desperate Measures

Doctor Who
The Rescue
Format: LP
View More

Happy Nowhere (30th Anniversary Deluxe Edition)

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Sony Music / Licensed by Fugitive Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Dog's Eye View's 1995 smash debut "Happy Nowhere," featuring the hit alternative radio single "Everything Falls Apart" receives a first-time-on-vinyl 30th Anniversary Deluxe Edition 2 LP Green W/Black Smoke Colored Vinyl Pressing /3000 copies.
This pressing features:
- All of the tracks from "Happy Nowhere" completely remastered for Vinyl
- Two never-before-heard demos, including the first, impromptu "Answering Machine Voice-Memo"-style recording of "Everything Falls Apart"
- Three live performances from 1996
- A lengthy retrospective essay from singer / songwriter Peter Stuart on the formation, history, and ultimate dissolution of the band
- A lengthy retrospective essay about the 90's Alternative phenomenon from MTV VJ / Esquire Magazine Editor Dave Holmes
- A gatefold vinyl jacket with expanded artwork

Bill Evans

At The BBC: The Complete 1965 London Sets

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Elemental Music Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

At the BBC The Complete 1965 London Sets is the first official release of the historic Jazz 625 show at the BBC Television Theatre, Shepherd's Bush, on 19th March 1965 by the Bill Evans Trio. Transferred from the original tape reels at the BBC and restored and mastered by Matthew Lutthans at The Mastering Lab. The limited-edition 180g 2-LP set includes an extensive insert with rare photographs from the show and liner notes by acclaimed jazz critic and author Marc Myers.

Freeman

FREEMAN

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Partisan
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

First released in 2014 - and with the original vinyl now fetching hundreds on Discogs - Aaron Freemans (aka Gene Ween) 'post-Ween' band debut is finally reissued for Record Store Day 2026, in an exclusive orange & purple split-colour pressing. FREEMAN is a heady mix of psychedelic, bluesy-art rock refracted through Genes Pop filter. The content is heavier, almost spiritual, compared to his previous work in Ween, yet the album epitomises Genes talent for the sardonic and his weird warped brilliance.

Peter Gabriel

Sledgehammer

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 12" Single
Label: Real World
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Sledgehammer was the first single to be taken from Peter Gabriels fifth solo studio album So, and was originally released on 21 April,1986.
A top five single in the UK and a Hot 100 #1 single in the USA, Sledgehammer with its multi-award winning video, directed by Stephen R Johnson heralded Gabriels shift into the mainstream consciousness and provided a first indication of Sos irresistible marriage of the artistic and the commercial. Id been revisiting my childhood obsession with 1960s soul music and was even considering doing a full album of covers, but instead I wrote Sledgehammer as more of a tribute to singers like Otis Redding. This was the end of the idea of me being a sort of cult artist at the fringes of the mainstream. There wasnt an option to go and hide in the shadows anymore.
Exclusive for Record Store Day 2026, Peter Gabriels Sledgehammer single is being re-issued to celebrate its 40th anniversary. The music replicates the original Sledgehammer 12 release but comes as a zoetrope picture disc, using images taken from the ground-breaking video.

Tracklist
A1 Sledgehammer (extended mix)
B1 Don't Break This Rhythm
B2 I Have the Touch (85 remix)

Peter Gabriel
Sledgehammer
Format: 12" Single
View More

Ghost Funk Orchestra

Live in Europe

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Karma Chief
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

In March 2025, after seven years as a live band, Ghost Funk Orchestra finally made their first overseas voyage to tour Europe and the UK. Live In Europe is a document that showcases the eight-piece touring band at the height of its powers.
The track list was constructed from two consecutive sold out shows, the first at Jassmine in Warsaw and the second at Paradiso in Amsterdam. It leans heavily on songs from An Ode To Escapism and A New Kind Of Love, while also including a few tracks from A Trip To The Moon, a nod to the early GFO days with the song "Evil Minds," and even a few brand new tunes.
Both shows were professionally recorded, with Amsterdams recording being handled by the Abbey Road Institute.

00:00 INTRO
03:23 EVIL MINDS
07:32 SCATTER
10:20 WHY
13:40 BLOCKHEAD
19:10 DROP ME A LINE
SIDE B
00:00 AGAIN
05:13 TO THE MOON
08:44 YOURS
12:56 FUZZY LOGIC
17:21 KING OF MISDIRECTION

Ghost Funk Orchestra

Ghost-Note

Swagism

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Mixto Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The long-out-of-print sophomore album from funk-futurist powerhouse Ghost-Note, led by Snarky Puppys Robert Sput Searight and Nate Werth, finally returns to wax. Originally released in 2018 and unavailable for years, Swagismhas become one of the most sought-after modern funk recordscommanding triple-digit prices on the secondary market. Featuring an all-star lineup including MonoNeon, Cory Henry, and Nigel Hall, this explosive 17-track double LP fuses deep funk, hip-hop, and jazz into an unstoppable groove odyssey.
RSD Exclusive: 2xLP, 180-gram vinyl housed in a deluxe gatefold sleeve with new liner notes and limited to 1,500 copies worldwide.

Grateful Dead

Boston Music Hall, Boston, MA 6/11/76

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 5 x LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

This 5LP, 180-gram vinyl set is the second installment of a five-part series of breakouts from the sold-out, limited-edition June 1976 CD Boxed Set originally released in 2020. Newly remastered for vinyl by Jeffrey Norman, featuring Plangent Processes tape restoration and speed correction. Produced for release by Grateful Dead archivist and legacy manager, David Lemieux. Limited Edition of 7,600 worldwide.
The fifth show of the Grateful Dead's comeback tour in June 1976 finds the band firing on all cylinders as they settle back into life on the road. A setlist filled with older material (Candyman, Eyes Of The World, Tennessee Jed), new material (Might As Well, Lazy Lightning > Supplication, Samson and Delilah), and new arrangements of classics from the Dead's early days (St. Stephen,""Dancing In The Street), this new iteration of the Grateful Dead featuring the return of Mickey Hart is one of the most powerful and precise versions of the band to date. With the Wall Of Sound retired, the Dead were playing the intimate confines of small theatres for the first time in years, and the perfection they achieved on this tour is on full display on June 11, 1976, in Boston. The magnificence of the vocal arrangements is one of the many new sonic highlights of the 1976 Grateful Dead, many Dead Heads saying the vocal harmonies never sounded as great as they did in June 1976. Songs like Looks Like Rain and The Music Never Stopped show off this renewed focus on the spectacular vocals the Dead were able to achieve. - David Lemieux

Tracklist
Side 1
1. Might As Well
2. Mama Tried
3. Tennessee Jed
4. Cassidy
Side 2
1. Candy Man
2. Big River
Side 3
1. Scarlet Begonias>
2. Looks Like Rain
Side 4
1. It Must Have Been The Roses
2. Lazy Lightning>
3. Supplication
Side 5
1. Brown-Eyed Women
2. Promised Land
Side 6
1. St. Stephen>
2. Dancing In The Street
Side 7
1. The Music Never Stopped
2. Ship Of Fools
3. Samson and Delilah
Side 8
1. Sugaree
Side 9
1. Sugar Magnolia>
2. Eyes Of The World
Side 10
1. Stella Blue
2. Sunshine Daydream
3. Johnny B. Goode

Grateful Dead
Boston Music Hall, Boston, MA 6/11/76
Format: 5 x LP

Vince Guaraldi

It's Arbor Day, Charlie Brown / Charlie Brown's All Stars! (Original Soundtrack Recordings)

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Lee Mendelson Film Productions
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Two discs celebrating the 50th anniversary of "It's Arbor Day Charlie Brown" and the 60th Anniversary of "Charlie Brown's All Stars." "Arbor Day" comes in a 10" clear 45 RPM "baseball" LP, and "All Stars" comes on a special glove-shaped 45 RPM vinyl for Record Store Day to celebrate the beloved Peanuts specials.
"All Stars," the second Peanuts primetime special following "A Charlie Brown Christmas" first aired June 8,1966. Performed by the Vince Guaraldi Sextet - Guaraldi (piano), Eugene "Puzzy" Firth (bass), Eddie Duran (guitar), John Coppola and Frank Snow (trumpet), and Lee Charlton (drums).
"Arbor Day" was the 15th and final Peanuts special Vince Guaraldi composed and performed. Guaraldi passed away on February 6, 1976, the day he recorded this wonderful music, at the age of 47. The Trio features Seward McCain (bass), and Jim Zimmerman (drums), who were with Vince when he passed away in Menlo Park CA. CBS aired the special several weeks later, on March 16, 1976.
Both TV specials were written by Charles Schulz, and produced by Bill Melendez and Lee Mendelson. "Arbor Day" was directed by Phil Roman and Melendez and "All Stars" was directed by Melendez.
The records were mixed and mastered for audiophiles, jazz lovers, and Peanuts fans everywhere. Clark Germain mixed "Arbor Day" at WonderWorld Studio, Vinson Hudson restored and mastered the records including "All Stars" and Sean & Jason Mendelson produced the records. This Record Store Day edition includes a 6-page trifold insert with art from the special, liner notes by Sean & Jason Mendelson, and Derrick Bang (author of "Vince Guaraldi at the Piano").
The records are bio-attributed vinyl to reduce carbon footprint, with sustainably forested paper and in a PVC gatefold jacket and a recycled bag. In 2026, for every copy sold, LMFP will contribute $1.00 to the Arbor Day Foundation, with a minimum annual donation of $12,000 leading to the planting of one tree is a forest of need. Purchases will not be tax deductible.

Tracklist
ARBOR DAY:
Rerun's Lament
Rerun's Lament (Reprise)
Ships Sail into Arbor
Laughter In The Library
Flatten Patten (Baseball Theme)
Young Man's Fancy
Jay Sterling Morton Jazz
We're the Visiting Team
Seeds for Thought (Joe Cool)
Don't Forget the Shovel
Sprinkle Your Bird
Snoopy at Bat
Lucy's Home Run
Rain, Rain, Go Away (Rain, Gentle Rain)
Happy Arbor Day, Charlie Brown
All Stars:
Charlie's Run
Charlie Brown's All Stars!
Baseball Theme (Medley)
Oh, Good Grief!
Surfin' Snoopy (Air Music)
Pebble Beach
Rain, Rain, Go Away

Vince Guaraldi
It's Arbor Day, Charlie Brown / Charlie Brown's All Stars! (Original Soundtrack Recordings)
Format: 2 x LP
View More

Roy Hargrove

Bern

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Time Traveler Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

For the first time ever, Roy Hargroves legendary 2000 performance at the Bern Jazz Festival is officially releasedrestored from the original tapes and remastered for audiophile fidelity.
This is Hargrove at the height of his powers: bold, lyrical, endlessly inventive. Fronting a stellar quintet of Larry Willis, Sherman Irby, Gerald Cannon, and Willie Jones, he bridges bebop tradition with 21st-century soul, moving effortlessly between hard-swinging post-bop, Latin-inflected grooves, and breathtaking ballads. Long regarded as a highlight by those lucky enough to be in the room, this release captures that lightning for the world. Roy Hargroves contributions to jazz were vast, bridging classic form and modern expression like few of his generation. This long-lost performance is both a celebration and a rediscoveryan essential document of one of jazzs true voices, now heard in full brilliance for the first time. Transferred from the original tapes and restored and mastered by Matthew Lutthans at The Mastering Lab. The limited-edition 180g 1-LP edition includes an extensive booklet with rare photographs, newly commissioned liner notes, and testimonials from band members and those influenced by his work.

Tracklist
SIDE A
A1. Stranded
A2. Depth
SIDE B
B1. Never Let Me Go
B2. Caryisms
B3. Circus

Roy Hargrove
Bern
Format: LP
View More

George Harrison

Dark Horse Zoetrope LP

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Dark Horse
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Continuation of the Record Store Day exclusive series reissuing George Harrison's full studio album catalog on limited, numbered Zoetrope vinyl. Released in December 1974, Dark Horse capped a prolific year for George Harrison, during which he had established his own Dark Horse record label, built a recording studio in his Friar Park home in England, and completed an ambitious tour of North America.

Tracklist
SIDE A:
1. Hari's on Tour (Express)
2. Simply Shady
3. So Sad
4. Bye Bye Love
5. Maya Love
SIDE B:
6. Ding Dong, Ding Dong
7. Dark Horse
8. Far East Man
9. It Is 'He' (Jai Sri Krishna)

George Harrison
Dark Horse Zoetrope LP
Format: LP
View More

George Harrison

Extra Texture Zoetrope LP

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Dark Horse
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Continuation of the Recod Store Day exclusive series reissuing George Harrison's full studio album catalog on limited, numbered Zoetrope vinyl. In late 1974, George returned to California to record his next album, the soul-tinged Extra Texture (Read All About It.) Leon Russell played piano on Tired of Midnight Blue, and for some of the sessions, Harrison was joined by guitarist Jesse Ed Davis, plus Jim Keltner, Paul Stallworth, and David Foster from new band Attitudes, who were later signed by Georges newly formed Dark Horse label.

Tracklist
SIDE A:
1. You
2. The Answer's At the End
3. This Guitar (Can't Keep From Crying)
4. Ooh Baby (You Know That I Love You)
5. World of Stone
SIDE B:

7. Can't Stop Thinking About You
8. Tired of Midnight Blue
9. Grey Cloudy Lies
10. His Name Is Legs (Ladies and Gentleman)

Joe Henderson

Consonance: Live at the Jazz Showcase

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 3 x LP
Label: Resonance Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Consonance: Live at the Jazz Showcase is the first ever release of saxophone titan Joe Henderson and his quartet featuring pianist Joanne Brackeen, bassist Steve Rodby and drummer Danny Spencer, captured live at Joe Segal's Jazz Showcase in Chicago, IL in February of 1978. The limited-edition 180g, 3-LPset was mastered from the original tapes by George Klabin and John Koenig, with lacquers cut by Matthew Lutthans at The Mastering Lab in Salina, KS, and pressed at Quebec's boutique audiophile pressing plant Le Vinylist. This is part of Resonance's debut launch of releases from Joe Segal's Jazz Showcase archives, marking the beginning of what will hopefully be a long line of incredible releases from the club's archives. The deluxe package includes newly curated liner notes by co-producer John Koenig, plus interviews with Joanne Brackeen, Steve Rodby, Danny Spencer, Joe Segal's son Wayne Segal and more.

Tracklist
A1 Mr. P. C. (24:00)
B1 - Inner Urge (26:46)
C1 - Invitation (22:15)
C2 - Relaxin' at Camarillo (7:41)
D1 - Recorda Me (23:33)
E1 - 'Round Midnight (16:10)
E2 - Good Morning Heartache (9:30)
F1 - Softly, As In A Morning Sunrise (23:39)
F2 - Isotope (6:37)

Joe Henderson
Consonance: Live at the Jazz Showcase
Format: 3 x LP
View More

Jade

Jade To The Max

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Get On Down
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Having grown up on jazz, Motown and gospel, vocalists Tonya Kelly, Joi Marshall and Di Reed known collectively as Jade - could make just about anything sound good. It also helped that the R&B trios 1992 debut, Jade To The Max, had top-notch production and material to work with as well. Hitmaker/mentor Vassal Benford penned nearly half of the eleven songs here with co-producer Ron Spearman. The full length boasts four singles hitting the Top 100 - "I Wanna Love You" (# 16), "Don't Walk Away" (#4), "One Woman" (#22), and "Looking for Mr. Do Right" (#69) and went on to be certified Platinum.
For Record Store Day 2026, Jade To The Max sees its first ever vinyl pressing in the US appropriately on a Jade colored vinyl run.

Tracklist
A1. Don't Walk Away
A2. I Wanna Love You
A3. I Want 'Cha Baby
A4. That Boy
A5. Out With The Girls
A6. Hold Me Close
B1. One Woman
B2. Give Me What I'm Missing
B3. Looking For Mr. Do Right
B4. Don't Ask My Neighbor
B5. Blessed

Jade
Jade To The Max
Format: LP
View More

Ahmad Jamal

At the Jazz Showcase: Live in Chicago

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Resonance Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

At the Jazz Showcase is the first ever release of piano legend Ahmad Jamal's trio featuring bassist John Heard and longtime drummer Frank Gant, captured live at Joe Segal's Jazz Showcase in Chicago, IL on March 20-21, 1976. The limited-edition 180g 2-LP set was mastered from the original tapes by engineer Matthew Lutthans at The Mastering Lab in Salina, KS, and pressed at Quebec's boutique audiophile pressing plant Le Vinylist. The deluxe package includes newly curated liner notes by Jamal scholar Eugene Holley, Jr., plus interviews with rapper/DJ/producer Pete Rock, Joe Segal's son Wayne Segal and more.

Tracklist
A1 - Ahmads Song (15:00)
A2 - Wave (13:40)
B1 - Have You Met Miss Jones (9:37)
B2 - Theme from M*A*S*H (11:49)
C1 - Dolphin Dance (9:59)
C2 - Prelude To A Kiss (9:28)
C3 - A Time for Love (8:27)
D1 - Swahililand (21:19)
D2 - A Nightingale Sang in Berkeley Square (3:11)

Ahmad Jamal

The Jayhawks

2 Meter Sessions

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Charly Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Never-before-released recordings - Amsterdam 1997 & 2000
for the first time ever on vinyl, the jayhawks present 2 meter sessions - an exclusive record store day 2026 release featuring two amsterdam sessions from 1997 and 2000.
side a revisits the sound of lies era with trouble, sound of lies, and big star in alternate acoustic versions, plus sister cry, extended from the 1992 hollywood town hall era with loose, expressive instrumental interplay.
side b highlights the smile era with somewhere in ohio, mr. wilson, im gonna make you love me, what led me to this town, and smile. these performances hum with warmth and space, capturing a band reconnecting with the heart of their songs.
each copy includes signed postcards featuring a black-and-white session still and a personal note from the band members, plus access to an archival video interview with gary louris and marc perlman.
if someone really gets our music, they feel it - it goes beyond the surface. - the jayhawks.

Tracklist
Side A
1. Trouble
2. Sound of Lies
3. Big Star
4. Sister Cry
Side B
1. Somewhere in Ohio
2. Mr. Wilson
3. Im Gonna Make You Love Me
4. Smile
5. What Led Me to This Town

The Jayhawks
2 Meter Sessions
Format: LP

Waylon Jennings & The Waylors

The Balladeer meets the Dukes of Hazzard

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Son of Jessi/Thirty Tigers
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

During the process of archiving and unearthing Waylons lost studio recordings, his son Shooter found the original recordings of lines of the Balladeer for the first two episodes of the Dukes of Hazzard, complete with bloopers and out-takes. Shooter also found the original recordings for the soundtrack to first season of the Dukes, produced by Richie Albright, and featuring Waylon and his smoking backing band.
The Balladeer meets the Dukes of Hazzard consists of:
Side A: The full recording of Waylons first session doing the voice-overs for the Dukes of Hazzard, complete with all the mistakes and bloopers, played over the music for season one of The Dukes of Hazzard. (~16:00)
Side B: The instrumental version of the music from the first season of The Dukes of Hazzard. (~16:00)

Waylon Jennings & The Waylors
The Balladeer meets the Dukes of Hazzard
Format: LP

Disco Darling

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 7" Vinyl
Label: School Boy/Interscope Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Disco Darling is an unreleased track by Diamond-certified, GRAMMY Award-nominated pop singer-songwriter Carly Rae Jepsen, originally recorded for her 2019 album Dedicated before being left on the cutting-room floor.
After a demo of the song leaked online, fans have begged for an official release. Now, the fan-favorite track finally gets its moment, arriving exclusively for Record Store Day on baby blue 7 vinyl with a disco ball etching on Side B.

Tracklist
Side A: Disco Darling
Side B: etching

Date: 4/18/2026

Label: Third Man Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

First ever US pressing of The Jesus and Mary Chains legendary Some Candy Talking EP, originally released 40 years ago, hot on the heels of the seminal Psychocandy LP. Releaed now as an expanded 12" that include all seven tracks from the 1986 2x7" UK edition and adding the previously unreleased acoustic version of Taste Of Cindy that will only be featured on the Third Man Records edition. Housed in a reproduction of the iconic original B&W 12" artwork with full color frameable insert featuring brand new and original artwork by Mel Butler.

George Jones

Cold Hard Truth

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

George Jones' 1999 return to traditional country music, his first album with Asylum Records. Produced by Keith Stegall, the album features strong, original honky-tonk ballads and raucous tunes, reminiscent of Jones' classic recordings. Cold Hard Truth is one of Jones' strongest albums in nearly two decades, offering a consistent, high-quality listening experience. Pressed for Record Store Day on light blue vinyl.

Jurassic 5

Quality Control: 25th Anniversary Edition

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 2 x LP
Label: Get On Down
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Jurassic 5 flexed serious old-to-the-new muscles in the 90s, beginning with their independently released single Unified Rebelution in 1994, and book-ending with their stellar debut full-length: 2000s Quality Control. They walked a tightrope between underground and mainstream hip-hop, and toured alongside rap peers as well as punk rockers on the Vans Warped Tour. Musically inventive and lyrically forward-thinking, each song on Quality Control is a new adventure, exploring engaging territory.
25 years out from its initial release, Quality Control has more than proven to be a timeless classic.
For the 25th Anniversary Edition "Quality Control" is presented in a double vinyl wood grained pressing. The gatefold jacket is housed in printed chipboard outer sleeve featuring a wood grain pattern, a homage to the iconic imagery of the classic album. The set is exclusively available for Record Store Day 2026.

Tracklist
A1. How We Get Along
A2. The Influence
A3. Great Expectations
A4. Quality Control Intro
A5. Quality Control
B1. Contact
B2. Lausd
B3. World Of Entertainment (W.O.E. Is Me)
B4. Monkey Bars
C1. Jurass Finish First
C2. Contribution
C3. Twelve
D1. The Game
D2. Improvise
D3. Swing Set

Jurassic 5
Quality Control: 25th Anniversary Edition
Format: 2 x LP

Chaka Khan

Naughty

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Get On Down
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

After a successful run with legendary funk outfit Rufus, Chaka Khan signed with Warner Bros. to launch her solo career with 1978's CHAKA. Two years later she was back with her second solo album, Naughty. Re-teaming with producer Arif Mardin, Chaka sounds even more assured and adventurous on the 1980 collection, which was cut at New York's Atlantic Studios with such instrumental aces as bassist Anthony Jackson and Average White Band guitarist Hamish Stuart in support - not to mention backing vocalists including future superstars Whitney Houston and Luther Vandross. Highlights include club favorite Clouds (one of two Ashford & Simpson-penned songs here), Too Much Love and the hit single Papillon (a.k.a. Hot Butterfly). Naughty delivers all the funk, soul and R&B any fan could ask for.
Get On Down now presents Naughty, on vinyl for the first time since the 80s in a Fig Cream colored vinyl run exclusively for Record Store Day 2026.

Tracklist
A1. Clouds
A2. Get Ready, Get Set
A3. Move Me No Mountain
A4. Nothing's Gonna Take You Away
A5. So Naughty
B1. Too Much Love
B2. All Night's All Right
B3. What You Did
B4. Papillon (AKA Hot Butterfly)
B5. Our Love's In Danger

Chaka Khan
Naughty
Format: LP
View More

Bruce Kulick From Kiss

Transformer

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Culture Factory
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Bruce Kulick was the lead guitarist of Kiss for over 12 years and is one of Kiss all-time "fan favorite" members. Transformer is the second solo album by Bruce Kulick released in 2004 which was never released on vinyl. This package is re-designed (with new art) & re-mastered for the Kiss fan base appeal. The same concept that we have done with the Eric Carr solo releases for RSD events in the past.
This is a must for fans/collectors of Kiss & will certainly be a sell out. This deluxe vinyl package includes: OBI side spine, new "Kiss influenced" art work, printed inner sleeve, color pull out poster and yellow & black splatter effect vinyl.

Yusef Lateef

Alight Upon the Lake: Live at the Jazz Showcase

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 3 x LP
Label: Resonance Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Alight Upon the Lake: Live at the Jazz Showcase is a previously unissued recording of woodwind multi-instrumentalist icon Yusef Lateef featuring pianist Kenny Barron, bassist Bob Cunningham and drummer Albert "Tootie" Heath captured live at Joe Segal's Jazz Showcase in Chicago, IL in June of 1975. The limited-edition 180g, 3-LP set was mastered from the original tapes by engineer Matthew Lutthans at The Mastering Lab in Salina, KS, and pressed at Quebec's boutique audiophile pressing plant Le Vinylist. The deluxe package includes newly curated liner notes by Lateef biographer Herb Boyd, plus interviews with woodwind master and Lateef mentee, Bennie Maupin, Joe Segal's son Wayne Segal and more.

Tracklist
A1 The Untitled (28:04)
B1 Mutually Exclusive (14:20)
B2 Eboness (13:02)
C1 Inside Atlantis (19:40)
C2 I Remember Webster (8:18)
D1 Dunia (10:21)
D2 Opus 1 & 2 (17:09)
E1 Golden Goddess (13:44)
E2 Straighten Up & Fly Right (13:37)
F1 Yusef's Mood (24:00)

Yusef Lateef
Alight Upon the Lake: Live at the Jazz Showcase
Format: 3 x LP

Adrianne Lenker

Live At Revolution Hall

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 3 x LP
Label: 4AD
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

In early 2025, Big Thief songwriter Adrianne Lenker shared a 120-minute, 43-track intimate live album entitled Live at Revolution Hall, an immersive sonic documentary compiled across three days of performances. Now, the album is being pressed to Standard Black Vinyl for the very first time, exclusive to Record Store Day 2026. Amid collaged soundbites of enthused applause and audience chatter, producer Andrew Sarlo takes listeners stage-side, where Lenker and her band (including Josefin Runsteen and Nick Hakim) embark on a setlist of deep-cuts, fan favorites (such as not a lot, just forever and anything), and unreleased gems (including oldest and happiness), delivered via twinkling keys, chill-inducing cello passages, and Lenkers emotionally stirring vocal delivery. Says Lenker of the release, Here is a little lighting in a jar, a capture of the spirit of all shows Ive ever played and ever will play. The music is alive, and the magic of recording is letting us get close to that spark at anytime, anywhere, and if we want to - over and over again.

Tracklist
A1. hello, i love you & blue lightning A2. - door & how are you? - A3. little thingslive A4. happinesslive A5. cut my hairlive A6. time escaping & wild whistlinglive
B1. cattails & soundcheck B2. ruinedcheck B3. - nick & josefin - B4. symbollive B5. real houselive B6. indiana & sneezing B7. - now westlin winds
C1. i do love youlive C2. - brief message for adrianne - C3. heavy focuslive C4. vampire empirelive C5. - lady midnight, I'll tape you back together - C6. born for loving youlive C7. I will always love youlive C8. - noah - C9. spud infinitylive
D1. - oso - D2. promise is a pendulumlive D3. - backwards intermission - D4. evolkcehc D5. fangs D6. oldestlive D7. sadness as a giftlive
E1. - drawing a star - E2. orangelive E3. two reverselive E4. free treasure & fire trucks E5. ripples & happy birthday alice E6. foollive E7. not a lot, just foreverlive E8. - naljf & crowd-
F1. no limitlive F2. donut seamlive F3. zombie girllive F4. - happy birthday everyone - F5. anythinglive F6. wake me up to drive (outside)

Adrianne Lenker

Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The landmark 1996 album reconstructed from BBC sessions and live broadcasts exclusively for Record Store Day!
collected here are selected recordings from the reading gig, broadcast on bbc radio 1, plus some previously unreleased studio takes of the albums tracks recorded for the stations evening session and mark radcliffe shows. cherrypicked by the band as the best possible coming up bbc recordings, theyve been sequenced for coming up at the bbc in the same order as the original studio album.

Look Outside Your Window

Look Outside Your Window

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: LOYW
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Look Outside Your Window is Corey Taylor, Jim Root, Sid Wilson, and Shawn Clown Crahan, who in the downtime during recording sessions for Slipknot's 2008 album All Hope Is Gone, began to freely create songs for themselves, exploring new directions with no outside expectations. Over the years, the existence of this project has seen coverage in outlets including Vice, Revolver, NME, Kerrang!, and countless others, and the fans have only grown louder in their demand to hear this album.  
now over 15 years later, the fans will finally get to experience it for themselves.  Splatter vinyl with a die-cut jacket, purple foil on the front of the jacket, purple flood inside the jacket, and embossed text on the back of the jacket.

Tracklist
1. 11th March

Lunachicks

We Can Be Worster

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Manic Merch
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Start spreadin' the news: New York City's premier punk rockers, the Lunachicks, have returned to rally the freaks, liberate ladyparts, and save the goddamn world. Following the release of their acclaimed memoir Fallopian Rhapsody (Hachette Books), the band stormed back with their first live shows in 17 years--headlining the main stage at Punk Rock Bowling 2021, followed by sold-out shows at Webster Hall and a slot in the CBGB Fest lineup with Iggy Pop.
From the stage to the page, the Lunachicks' story continues with the upcoming documentary Pretty Ugly: The Story of the Lunachicks, directed by Ilya Chaiken and slated for theatrical release in spring 2026, and this Record Store Day release, the first-ever best-of compilation, We Can Be Worster.
Throughout the '90s and early '00s, the Lunachicks' hard-hitting hooks, gritty guitars, and pounding beats earned them a cult following stretching from the Bowery to Tokyo. Formed as teenagers at NYC's famed LaGuardia High School, the band set out to conquer the world like their idols The Ramones, Black Sabbath, Kiss, The Clash, and Blondie. After cutting their teeth at legendary clubs like CBGB and The Limelight, they caught the attention of Kim Gordon and Thurston Moore of Sonic Youth, leading to their 1990 debut Babysitters on Acid on London's Blast First Records.
With each release, the Lunachicks gleefully dumped technicolor chaos on propriety, morality, and the patriarchy--but it was their live shows that cemented their legacy. A riot of wigs, costumes, makeup, and blaring guitars, their performances were equal parts spectacle, satire, and sheer musical power.
Lunachicks released five studio albums, a live record, countless singles and videos, and appeared in films and compilations. They've shared stages with The Ramones, Iggy Pop, Joan Jett, No Doubt, Rancid, NOFX, Buzzcocks, and The Go-Go's.
Today, Theo (vocals), Gina (guitar), Squid (bass), and Chip (drums) remain a fearless, ferocious quartet-still loud, smart, and gloriously unhinged.

Tracklist
1 Drop Dead
2 Less Teeth More Tits
3 Don't Want You
4 Jan Brady
5 Bad Ass Bitch
6 C.I.L.L.
7 Plugg
8 Luxury Problem
9 Light as a Feather
10 Jerk Of All Trades
11 Babysitters On Acid
12 Dear Dotti
13 Heart of Glass

Lunachicks
We Can Be Worster
Format: LP
View More

Freddie Mcgregor

Showcase

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Observer / Prestige Elite
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Freddie McGregors Showcase (1981), produced by roots reggae icon Winston Niney Holness, is a product of the eras vocal-and-dub showcase format and a key release from one of Jamaicas most iconic voices. Featuring dub-forward production and a seamless blend of Lovers Rock and conscious roots material, the album bridges the sound of 1970s Kingston with the more melodic direction that would carry McGregor into international success with Big Ship the following year. This is the first official reissue in four decades and an essential record of McGregors early solo era. Limited edition numbered pressings on heavyweight color vinyl, exclusive for Record Store Day 2026.

Tracklist
Side A
The Overseer
Lovers Rock J.A. Style
Chant It Down
Sitting In The Park
Jah A We Father (Love One Another)
Jah Will Bless You
Side B
The Overseer - Version
Lovers Rock J.A. Style - Version
Chant It Down - Version
Sitting In The Park - Version
Jah A We Father (Love One Another) - Instrumental
Jah Will Bless You - Instrumental

Freddie Mcgregor
Showcase
Format: LP
View More

Tate McRae

Hung Up On You

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 7" Vinyl
Label: Nettwerk
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

For the first time ever, Tate McRaes hung Up On You arrives on 7" vinylpaired with a special live recording of her breakout single One Day, captured at YouTube Space NYC in 2020.
from her early days as a so you think you can dance finalist to becoming one of the defining voices of modern pop, the canadian singer, songwriter, and dancer has carved out a singular path. with over 8 billion career streams, a #1 billboard 200 album (so close to what, 2025), and chart-dominating singles like you broke me first, greedy, and sports car, mcrae has proven herself as both a powerhouse vocalist and an evocative storyteller. named in time100 nexts list for 2025, shes earned acclaim for blending raw vulnerability with the effortless lustre of a natural born performer.
pressed on limited neon violet vinyl, this exclusive rsd 7 captures both sides of mcraes artistrythe sleek studio precision of hung up on you and the heartfelt intimacy of one day. a must-have collectors piece from one of pops brightest stars.

A1. Hung Up On You
B1. One Day (February, 27, 2020 - Live at Youtube NYC)

Joni Mitchell

For The Roses

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Joni's 1972 album, For The Roses, was her first for David Geffen's Asylum Records. Joni originally had intended the album cover to be art that she created that was illustrative of the song, "For The Roses," and showed her cynicism to the music business at the time. Geffen vetoed her artwork because he thought it was not a good look to have a horse with roses coming out of its ass! So, Joni ultimately compromised to use the Joel Bernstein photo that became the cover. 
This special limited edition for Record Store Day restores Joni's original vision for the cover artwork for the first time. Pressed on rose color vinyl.

Tracklist
1. Banquet
2. Cold Blue Steel And Sweet Fire
3. Barangrill
4. Lesson In Survival
5. Let The Wind Carry Me
6. For The Roses
7. See You Sometime
8. Electricity
9. You Turn Me On I'm A Radio
10. Blonde In The Bleachers
11. Woman Of Heart And Mind
12 Judgement Of The Moon And Stars (Ludwig's Tune)

Joni Mitchell
For The Roses
Format: LP
View More

Ngozi Family

Gate Crash '78

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Now-Again Records
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The lost Ngozi Family/Chissy Zebby Tembo album! Only ever test pressed and never commercially released, Now-Again presents the ultimate Zamrock rarity and an essential entry from Zambian guitarist and bandleader Paul Ngozis catalog.
Zamrock was a bona-fide rock scene; on the African continent, only Nigeria can claim one so comprehensive, and Nigerias was largely catalyzed and funded by subsidiaries of the European major labels. Zamrock was as independent as its newly-named country, formerly known as Northern Rhodesia.
Now-Again now issues this never before released full-length which includes an eight-page booklet, filled with rare photos and details on the Ngozi Familys musical journey, for Record Store Day 2026.

Tracklist
A1. Apongozi
A2. Jealousy
A3. Poem Writer
A4. Munzanga
B1. Gate Crash
B2. Easy Baby
B3. Bukoko
B4. Tikonde Alendo

Ngozi Family
Gate Crash '78
Format: LP
View More

Charlie Patton

Primeval Blues, Rags, And Gospel Songs

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Shanachie Entertainment
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Of all the early blues greats Charlie Patton maintains the most prestigious and elevated place of admiration and respect. He alone seems like the voice of a powerful long lost musical construct that, as Rolling Stone wrote, "after almost 95 years Patton's magnetic, almost palpable presence will still jump out of your speakers and grab you by the throat" this album displays the whole range of styles he encompassed and exhibits both his pure power and subtle expressiveness in his singing and guitar playing. doing justice to his great artistry are the very highest standards of sound quality achieved here in the transfers of such treasured old recordings.

Tracklist
SIDE A
1. Revenue Man Blues
2. Hang It On The Wall
3. Prayer Of Death - Part 1
4. High Water Everywhere - Part 2
5. Stone Pony Blues
6. Prayer Of Death - Part 2
7. Mean Black Cat Blues
SIDE B
8. 34 Blues
9. Youre Gonna Need Somebody When You Die

The first repress EVER of the 1991 Pavement cult classic EP, Perfect Sound Forever, available on a white vinyl 10 for Record Store Day 2026. Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

More than125 photographs over 224 pages, chronicling the Dark Matter tour.

Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers

July 16, 1978 - Paradise Theater, Boston, MA

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: UMe
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

A wild night from the You're Gonna Get It tour was recorded on 2-track at the Paradise Rock Club in Boston, MA, and broadcast by local rock radio station WBCN-FM.
Bootleg recordings of the broadcast have been a fan favorite for decades.
Now the Tom Petty Estate is making this concert officially available.
The audio restoration was done by Tom Petty producer Ryan Ulyate.
The show features 9 performances, including 5 classic cover versions.
The LP is on 180g pink and green translucent splatter color vinyl and contains a vintage tour sticky pass.

Tracklist
"Side A
1 Anything That's Rock 'N' Roll 3:43
2 Don't Bring Me Down 3:42
3 Band Intros :40
4 You're Gonna Get It 4:01
5 Breakdown 06:40
6 Too Much Ain't Enough 4:19
 
Side B:
1 Shout 7:53
2 I Fought The Law 2:18
3 (Get Your Kicks On) Route 66 3:58
4 I'm A King Bee 6:09"

Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers
July 16, 1978 - Paradise Theater, Boston, MA
Format: LP

Phoenix

United

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The iconic debut album from Phoenix originally released in 2000, United introduced the world to the French Fours unmistakable blend of indie pop, French touch flair, and timeless songwriting a sound that would shape a generation. United is a piece of indie music history featuring standout tracks like If I Ever Feel Better and Too Young. This limited-edition release on Crystal Clear Vinyl is a must-have celebration of the album that started it all.

Tracklist
A Side :
1.School's Rules
2.Too Young
3.Honeymoon
4.If I Ever Feel Better
5.Party Time
B Side :
1.On Fire
2.Embuscade
3.Summer Days
4.Funky Squaredance, Pt. 1/2/3 (Medley)
5.Funky Squaredance, Pt. 2
6.Funky Squaredance, Pt. 3
7.Definitive Breaks

United

Phoenix

Alphabetical

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: Rhino
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

A sleek sophomore gem, Phoenixs second album - originally released in 2004 - cemented the bands signature sound with polished production, smooth grooves, and sophisticated pop craftsmanship. From the irresistible hooks of Everything Is Everything to the soulful charm of Run Run Run, this limited vinyl pressing invites to rediscover an album that marked a bold artistic leap for the band refined, confident, and effortlessly cool. Pressed on Silver vinyl.

Pink Floyd

Live From the Los Angeles Sports Arena, April 26th, 1975 

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 4 x LP
Label: Legacy Recordings
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Pink Floyd Live From the Los Angeles Sports Arena, April 26th, 1975 contains 16 live recordings captured by the renowned bootlegger Mike Millard at the bands legendary Los Angeles Sports Arena concert on April 26th, 1975. The audio has been lovingly restored and remastered by acclaimed producer and musician Steven Wilson. This Record Store Day exclusive vinyl version includes 4 LPs pressed on clear vinyl.

Tracklist

1. Raving And Drooling
Side B
1. You've Got To Be Crazy
Side C

2. Have a Cigar
Side D
1. Shine on You Crazy Diamond (Pts. 6-9)
Side E
1. Speak to Me
2. Breathe (In the Air)
3. On the Run
4. Time
Side F
1. The Great Gig in the Sky
2. Money
3. Us and Them
Side G
1. Any Colour You Like
2. Brain Damage
3. Eclipse
Side H
1. Echoes

Pink Pantheress

Girl Like Me

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: 7" Vinyl
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

Following the success of her critically acclaimed sophomore mixtape Fancy That and its star-studded remix expansion Fancy Some More?, PinkPantheress delivers an essential Record Store Day exclusive: the fan-favorite track "Girl Like Me."
This limited RSD edition features the original track along with reimaginings by Kaytranada and Oklou. A masterclass in earworm production, "Girl Like Me" famously flips samples from Basement Jaxxs Romeo into a jittery, UK garage-infused anthem.
The track's continued cultural impact led to PinkPantheress gaining her first GRAMMY nominations in 2025, including Best Dance Pop Recording and a nod for Fancy That as Best Dance/Electronic Album.

Pink Pantheress
Girl Like Me
Format: 7" Vinyl
View More

Label: Demon Records

MORE INFO

First time physical audio only release for Pixies unique first ever acoustic live performance at the Newport Folk Festival in 2005. This recording sees the reunited line-up of Frank Black, Kim Deal, Joey Santiago and David Lovering give alternate takes on 22 of the biggest Pixies favourites and is released on 2LP colour vinyl (1 x green, 1 x yellow lp) exclusively for Record Store Day 2026, twenty years after its original release on dvd.

MORE INFO

Following on from the 40th anniversary celebrations of The Power Stations debut album and deluxe edition, the live show from the CD box will be broken out as a 2LP gatefold package, with The Power Stations electric live show on vinyl for the first time, as well as it being the bands first official live album on vinyl. The show features Michael Des Barres on vocals after Robert Palmer departed, with the original lineup of Tony Thompson, Andy Taylor and John Taylor.

Prince Buster

THE BLUE BEAT LABEL Presents PRINCE BUSTER ON TOUR

DETAILS

Date: 4/18/2026
Format: LP
Label: The Blue Beat Label
Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

MORE INFO

The legendary Prince Buster On Tour on the legendary, ever-collectable Blue Beat Label, recorded during his tour of the UK in 1967, featuring classic tracks such as Madness, Cincinnati Kid, Al Capone and others. Remastered and released on 12" vinyl with updated design, a gatefold sleeve with a fascinating list of the tour dates (The Marquee and The West Indies Club, Ritz Ballroom for example), new sleeve notes about the tour, Prince Buster, The Blue Beat Label and the songs themselves.
Originally released on The Blue Beat Label almost 60 years ago in 1967, this Record Store Day 2026 special of this classic is must-have for all Prince Buster fans and collectors of The Blue Beat Label vinyl.

Tracklist
Side A
1. Intro.
2. Madness
3. Take It Easy
4. Oh Love
5. Seven Times To Rise
6. 007
7. Come To Jamaica
Side B
1. Cincinnati Kids
2. Move Over
3. Sound and Pressure
4. On The Beach
5. Al Capone
